response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Given its immense worth to you, I propose a transaction price of $950,000. This offer represents an exceptional opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a price that is both competitive and fair. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially bringing this product to your esteemed organization.", "product_price": 950000}
